symptoms.name: Swelling
symptoms.pattern: May be present at affected site

symptoms.name: Joint stiffness
symptoms.pattern: May be present at affected site

symptoms.name: Limited range of motion
symptoms.pattern: May be present at affected site

symptoms.name: Fever
symptoms.pattern: May be present, especially in acute cases

symptoms.name: Paraplegia
symptoms.pattern: May occur in cases of spinal involvement

vital_signs.temperature: May be elevated in acute cases
vital_signs.pulse: May be elevated in acute cases
vital_signs.respiratory_rate: May be elevated in acute cases

physical_findings: Pain on palpation of affected area
Swelling of affected joint or area
Limited range of motion of affected joint
Deformity of affected bone or joint

imaging_findings.X-ray: May show bone destruction, joint space narrowing, periosteal reaction
imaging_findings.CT scan: Provides better visualization of bone and soft tissue involvement
imaging_findings.MRI: Imaging procedure of choice; shows bone marrow edema, soft tissue inflammation, and abscesses

required: Clinical presentation consistent with musculoskeletal tuberculosis
Positive microbiological findings (culture, PCR) for Mycobacterium tuberculosis
